Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it could be an asset of great significance to you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $850000. We understand that its true worth may be subjective, but we are confident that you will find its quality and features unparalleled. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will not only acquire a valuable item but also potentially benefit from exclusive access to future updates and enhancements. If you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this outstanding product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $850,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $850,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
